title: DATS activity schema
description: JSON-schema representing an activity/process in the DATS model. A type of process scheduled in a study

title.description: a property to specify the title/name of the process

startDate.description: a timestamp to record the starting point of the process

endDate.description: a timestamp to record the ending point of the process

duration.description: a property to specify the duration of the activity

location.description: a property to specify where the process is performed

performedBy.description: a property to specify the person(s) or organisation(s) responsible for executing the process
